Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering it to you at a special price of $10,000. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
